description:

I hope you enjoy this short and simple platformer game I have made where the enemies break the blocks below you in a chain reaction when they die! :)

Play the game on NewGrounds!

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/781655

--Controls--

Move left of right == A/D or Arrow Keys

Jump == W or Z or Up Arrow or Space

Restart == R

Back to main menu == L/ESC

Mute == M
